book.synopsis: Former cop-turned-dog trainer Jack Field is called in when the body of Allison DeMarco is found on her kitchen floor, accompanied by her high-strung Airedale, Ginger, and must enlist his special skills to find out what happened since Ginger appears to be the only witness to the crime. Original.
